actions.name: Star Motor
actions.description:
Effect: The user's Type and Forme can be changed whenever they consume Fuel as part of an Exploration or Camp Action, with the Forme Change remaining until another Fuel is consumed or the user empties their fuel tank as a Simple Action. Each Fuel type grants the user an Extra Ability, Connection Attack, and unique Typing.

- Blazing Fuel: Speed Boost, Blazing Torque. Steel/Fire Type.

- Combat Fuel: Stamina, Combat Torque. Steel/Fighting Type.

- Magical Fuel: Misty Surge, Magical Torque. Steel/Fairy Type.

- Noxious Fuel: Pollution, Noxious Torque. Steel/Poison Type.

- Wicked Fuel: Reckless, Wicked Torque. Steel/Dark Type.
